phrases: K-Kana-san, you came here to study for the exam, right?
You were thinking about doing this all along!
Wh-Why do not you just do it if you are so desperate?
I-Is not it a bit early for that?
When you do not try to do anything.
Because you never set the mood for that
I am Chiaki, proud son of Keiko and Manabu!
Then come forth, I shall prey upon your neck!
Wait, never mind, forget I said that!
No, no, do it in order!
What do people do in this situation?
Oh, whatever, start with a kiss.
I am not sweaty, am I?
Crap, shoulda plucked my nipple hair.
N-No, I just wanted to get prepared!
Besides, you are not supposed to rush this stuff.
I really hate the whole we kissed, so now we are dating thing.
K-Kana-san, a lady ought not be so quick to show her skin.
It is not like I just want to kiss, either.
I, like, want to be closer to you.
So I want to learn more about you,
a-and I want you to know me better, too.
You wanted me to know you better...
Just so you know, I do not have that nice of a body.
And I did not get a chance to shower today, so I might be sweaty and stuff.
You were super hot when I caught a glimpse just now, though.
I have not prepared for this stuff at all.
My mom made me bring some on my way out today.
So we are all set, then.
Hey, Chiaki, I brought snacks for Kana-ch
Have some when you are done.
Onee-chan, do not go upstairs right now!
The student president caught me smoking,
And he is making me quit as a condition for dating.
Wait, why am I actually quitting?
I never even said I would go out with him, did I?
What did you need from me
How you get shy when praised?
I never said I would go out with you!
One kiss does not mean we are dating
That was not even my first kiss or anything!
Do not think you can win a girl that easily.
What do you want me to do, then?
Wh-Why are you even, you know...
You do not even like me, do you?!
I cannot say I do not.
You do not know anything about me.
True, I do not know much about you.
Other than what I have seen at school.
You do not have many friends.
You are always sleeping in class.
You could go home after school, but you stay and smoke.
I did not catch you by coincidence.
You have been on my mind for a while.
You thought I would let you do me if you asked?
I thought you would sleep with anyone who talked to you.
Had I been a player, you would have been played.
Although, I do prefer thicker women.
Student president or not, you are still just a horny bastard inside.
Yes, if I could sleep with you, I would.
So I wanted to take you for myself before anyone else did.
D-Dude, what are you talking about?
I want to make you mine.
I have never liked anyone before.
But if this is not love, then what is it?
If it is all right with you, of course.
I will not force you into it.
But I have been putting off answering for months now.
I tried approaching slowly, but it ran away when I got right near it.
I really need to give her an answer.
Hey, Furuya-kun, I have waited long enough.
W-We can talk about that later.
So, do you have an answer for me?
I cannot tell if you are serious or just playing me, Minagawa-san.
Sorry, I will ask seriously this time.
So that is a no, huh?
I guess you are not interested.
No, it is not that I am not interested,
I just cannot bring myself to answer.
I cannot tell if you are serious or playing me either, Furuya-kun.
I did not think she would give up so easily.
What if she is acting, and she is waiting for me to stop her?
I made her wait so long.
I will try talking to her again later.
She must be feeling at least some remorse.
She has not given up, she is lost interest.
Why are you staring at me? (_)
Wait, I thought she was angry at me.
Why are you staring at me? (_)
I felt like teasing you a little.
I am not in any hurry for an answer.
He was actually staring at me!
My friend handed me a love letter.
Sorry to do this during exams, but we need to talk.
Do you have time after school?
He really is a nice person.
I never expected this from you.
And she wanted me to ask you for your answer.
This is more stressful for you than anyone else.
Can you tell Yoshinaga I said sorry?
Are not you going to try again?
Well, apparently, I am just a nice guy to her.
What would you do if I confessed to you, then?
I do not know anything about that stuff.
You would not have any fun dating me.
I think my crush would say the same thing.
Maybe you should be a bit proactive.
where the guy hugs the girl and shouts that he loves her?
W-Would not it bother you if someone did that to you?
But you are a nice person,
so I might be okay with it.
We need to study for exams.
So, I have decided to give up on confessing.
I would rather not end up getting friend-zoned.
You would not know what to do if I confessed to you, right?
But I am not the person you like.
You said it would bother you, so it is probably hopeless.
Should I not have said that?
I will turn her down myself tomorrow.
She had to go through you, but she had the courage to confess, and I want to honor that.
He is such a nice person.
Not that that would ever happen.
Next episode: Watching You From Afar.
